column4: Hello, Is it recommended to do a sudo do-release-upgrade  on ubuntu 9.1?
How do I upgrade from 9.10 to 11?  Is it recommended to do a sudo do-release-upgrade on ubuntu 9?
I'd suggest you consider upgrading to 10.04 and then to 12.04 (since 10.04 and 12.04 are both LTS, you can skip the intermediate versions when upgrading)
read the links ubottu gave you last time you asked
